description: A muscle is an anatomical structure consisting of a contractile form of tissue that animals use to effect movement.

http://schema.org/nerveMotor.description: The neurological pathway extension that involves muscle control.

http://schema.org/antagonist.description: The muscle whose action counteracts the specified muscle.

title: Muscle
